# Load

```{r,echo=FALSE,results = "asis"}
rm(list = ls())
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
library(modelsummary) # for N in datasummary
# set constant ----
# set constant ----
n_observation_list <-
  c(50, 100, 200, 1000)
sigma_list <-
  c(0.001, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0)

# load, estimate, and save data ----
## linear demand and linear cost ----
### without without_demand_shifter_y ----
for(nn in 1:length(n_observation_list)){
  for(ss in 1:length(sigma_list)){
    temp_nn <-
      n_observation_list[nn]
    temp_sigma <-
      sigma_list[ss]
    filename <-
      paste(
        "linear_linear_",
        "n_",
        temp_nn,
        "_sigma_",
        temp_sigma,
        sep = ""
      )
    cat(filename,"\n")
    # load 
    target_data <-
      readRDS(file = 
                here::here(
                  paste(
                    "R/output/data_",
                    filename,
                    ".rds",
                    sep = ""
                  )
                )
      )
  }
}

options(modelsummary_format_numeric_latex = "plain") # for modelsummary output
```
